question: If we consider that BSE Index has increased from 17000 to 17170 today, it would mean that __________?
option1: Total Value of the Share market securities has gone up by 1%
option2: Total value of the share market securities has gone up by 170 Crore Rupees
option3: Total value of the securities which constitute the index has increased 1%
option4: Total value of the securities which constitute the index has increased by 170 Crore Rupees
answer: Total value of the securities which constitute the index has increased 1%
